title: Stormcaller Summit
tagline: in which the Fellowship confronts Hralgar's dream
summary: Kenzo, possessed by Hralgar, leads the party through a violent storm to Stormcaller Tower.
Wellby sees a vision of an orc with the Cloak of Rainbows after requesting Hralgar's guidance.
The Fellowship uses their abilities to bypass storm elementals and reach the tower's top.
Sharing stories with the giant Hralgar, the adventures attempt to awaken him from his dream.
Hralgar regains his memories, Kenzo recovers from possession, and the party prepares to free Hralgar from his dream.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship engages with Hralgar's dreams at Stormcaller Tower, leading to his awakening and Kenzo's release from possession.
